mapper.select: select c.customer_seq, c.email, c.pw, c.name, c.profileImg, c.customer_type from customer c where c.customer_seq = ( select following_seq from customer , follow where customer.customer_seq = follow.customer_seq and follow.customer_seq = #{customer_seq} )
select * from customer where email = #{email} and customer_type = 0
select * from customer where email = #{email} and customer_type = 1
select * from customer where email = #{email} and customer_type = 2
mapper.insert: insert into follow (follow_seq, customer_seq, following_seq) values (follow_seq.nextval, #{customer_seq}, #{following_seq})
mapper.delete: delete from follow where customer_seq = #{customer_seq} and following_seq = #{following_seq}
delete from customer where customer_seq like #{customer_seq}
